summary:
**Meeting Overview**: The Dallas Board of Adjustment (Panel C) will convene on January 23, 2025, at 10:30 A.M. for a briefing, followed by a public hearing at 1:00 P.M. The meeting will take place at Dallas City Hall and will also be accessible via videoconference. The primary purpose is to discuss and decide on various zoning variance requests and special exceptions.

**Key Agenda Items**: The meeting will include a staff presentation, public testimony, and a review of the case docket, which consists of uncontested items, holdover items, and individual cases.

**Important Details**: Significant proposals include three variance requests for front-yard setbacks at 2635 Pennsylvania Avenue and 5000 East Side Avenue, as well as a request for special exceptions related to fence height and visibility obstruction at 929 Brookwood Drive. Additionally, a holdover case at 3226 Lawnview Avenue seeks special exceptions concerning fence height and opacity.

**Action Items**: The Board will seek approval for the minutes from the previous meeting on December 16, 2024, and will make decisions on the listed variance and special exception requests. Individuals wishing to speak must register by January 22, 2025, at 5 P.M. to participate in the public hearing.
